long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Q: Your Daily Coding Challenge

Daily Q is a Chrome extension designed to help you practice coding consistently. Every day, you receive a new JavaScript coding question—the daily question—that is shared among all users. This encourages a community of learning and problem-solving.

Features:

Daily Coding Question: Get a fresh coding challenge every day in JavaScript.
Consistency Tracker: Keep track of how many days in a row you’ve solved the daily question.
Earn Medals: Achieve medals for solving multiple consecutive daily questions (e.g., 3-day streak, 5-day streak).
Share Your Success: Share your solutions and achievements on social media to inspire others and celebrate your progress.
Why Use Daily Q?

Consistency is key to mastering coding and problem-solving skills. Daily Q helps you build a daily habit of coding practice, ensuring that you make continuous progress. By focusing on one question each day, you can steadily improve your coding abilities and stay motivated.

Join our community of learners and start your daily coding journey with Daily Q!
